data.message: PLEASE Bring back "lists"!!!  Everyone wants them back. We need to be able to somehow organize this mess that has become Facebook. A good example of why these are needed is for "Local Links", so that if there's something going on in our area, we could switch to that list of pages pertaining to our own areas/situations. Why can't you understand how much this is needed on here?

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Jd. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2piQiJY. -Rhea
